children.value: What is the Backbone endpoint for WebSockets?
Why does my websocket connection disconnect after a while?

Idle connections that exceed beyond an hour will get disconnected. Adding 'pings' to your websocket connection will
prevent the connection from going idle. Any unrecognized requests will trigger the server to close the connection with
an error message.
web3.js 1.0.0-beta.34 has an open issue with request headers
